channel.title: Donator Icon --- [HELP]

item.title: Donator Icon --- [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

Mk oxygen
well this might not work 100% PM me if it doesnt

open your Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and find:

[code]else if (s.startsWith(“pray9”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(“C:/.pkersworld_file_store_32/Sprites/orbs/ring18.png”);
anInt1440 = 27;
anInt1441 = 27;
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}[/code]

under that add this

[code]else if (s.startsWith(“icondon”))
{
try
{
anInt1440 = 25;
anInt1441 = 16;
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(“xxxx/donator.png”);
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch (Exception exception)
{
System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
}
}[/code]

in the code you just added you will need to edit the place to the image:

Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(“xxxx/donator.png”);

now save+close and open your client.java

and find something like:

/* mod icons custom */ aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[2] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon1"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[3] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon2"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[16] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("bluurricon1");

and add this with that code:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[15] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(“icondon”);

save+close and compile

[you can find a donator icon on google]
I can also upload one for you

[i did not make this]

Read full topic
